text: |Tall building zone|Principles| ||| |Zone E (Leamouth)|a. This zone has a primarily residential character. b. Tall buildings in this zone should respect the primacy of the Canary Wharf zone, and step down towards the River Thames and the East India Dock Basin and ensure glimpses and views across the zone. c. An appropriate height for the tallest point in this zone is 90m AOD.|
